alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Lee; Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN OGLE...NORTHEASTERN LEE AND SOUTHWESTERN DE KALB COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ashton to near Rochelle to near Shabbona. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Rochelle, Oregon, Shabbona, Waterman, Hillcrest, Malta, Franklin Grove, Ashton, Paw Paw, Lost Nation, Creston, Lindenwood, Lee, Steward, Kings, Chana, and Nachusa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
